constituent: revile, flowers, eye, cross-eyed, net, march
heisigStory: The verbal abuse involved in reviling those who do not deserve it can be compared to a march of flowers in full boom having an eyeball of nastiness cast over them (literally, of course).
koohiiStory1: They gays were reviled by society, so they put flowers above their eyes and marched around.
koohiiStory2: In Northern Ireland, bitter religious groups revile their opponents by marching defiantly under their very eye, holding flowers that symbolize their beliefs.
kunYomi: ないがしろ、なみ.する、くらい、さげす.む
myStory: lơ là. xem nhẹ. bỏ qua. cỏ một con rồng mở mắt nằm phớt lờ xung quanh
